getInitializationBlock().return: Block number in which the contract was initialized

hasInitialized().return: Whether the contract has been initialized by the time of the current block

nodes.documentation: @return Block number in which the contract was initialized
nodes.name: getInitializationBlock

nodes.documentation: @return Whether the contract has been initialized by the time of the current block
nodes.name: hasInitialized

nodes.documentation: @dev Function to be called by top level contract after initialization has finished.
nodes.name: initialized

nodes.documentation:
@dev Function to be called by top level contract after initialization to enable the contract
     at a future block number rather than immediately.
nodes.name: initializedAt
